Una volta che si vede il pacchetto che si desidera, premere Invio e il pacchetto verrà installato nella cartella del progetto. NOTA : Per installare alcuni pacchetti, è necessario avere Git installato.

metadata.description: PHP Syntax Hint is a plugin for Brackets, which will help you alot in writing php SYNTAX, MYSQL Queries as this will auto suggest Syntax while coding, within Brackets software. The best part of it is that if you want to write some words again and again, just go to Help > Show Extensions Folder. Once folder opens up, open folder user > brackets-php-syntax-hint. There you will get php-syntax.txt, open that file and go on adding syntax and words you require and reload Brackets to enjoy writing codes(words you have added).  They will appear in the dropdown as HINT, press ENTER and it's done.

metadata.name: brackets-script-builder
metadata.title: Brackets Script Builder
metadata.description:
Allows to run programs contained in one file (can be used for Scala, Java, Python, Ruby, Node, C++, Bash) from Brackets and display results in panel.
It is possible to create own build systems via 'Edit > Script Builder Configuration' menu item and editing opened JSON file (you need to restart Brackets afterwards).
Based on Brackets Builder (http://github.com/Vhornets/brackets-builder).

Keyboard shortcuts:
* F9 to run current file as a script.
* F10 to compile current file.
* F11 to run compilation result.

metadata.name: brackets-script-builder-and-framework-launcher
metadata.title: Brackets Script Builder and framework launcher
metadata.description:
Allows to run programs contained in one file (can be used for Scala, Java, Python, Ruby, Node, C++, Bash) from Brackets and display results in panel. It is possible to create own build systems via 'Edit > Script Builder Configuration' menu item and editing opened JSON file (you need to restart Brackets afterwards). Based on Brackets Builder (http://github.com/Vhornets/brackets-builder). I add to the original one a framework management and also an OS detection for execution. Add frameworks over the UI Keyboard shortcuts: * Alt-F12 to show the dialog for framework choice / add. * Alt-F8 to launch the environment.
* Alt-F1 to run current file as a script. * F10 to compile current file. * F11 to run compilation result.

metadata.name: brackets-semicolon-terminator
metadata.title: Semicolon Terminator
metadata.description:
SHIFT+ENTER - > Puts semicolon at current line, creates and indents new line below. 
ALT+ENTER - > Puts semicolon at the end of the current line, but keeps the cursor where it is. 
Simple, useful.

This is a modification to an original work which was inserting extra carriage returns and would continue to add semicolons to lines that already had them.  I also didn't like the shortcuts, so I updated to something that made more sense to me. 
Based entirely on https://github.com/nechor/brackets-semicenter

metadata.description: Easily link your files (PHP, JavaScript, CSS, images, audio, video, fonts) into the focused document (HTML, PHP, CSS). It allows to copy several files in one time to any project folder or download from CDN and get them tagged automatically.

es.description: Enlaza fácilmente tus archivos (PHP, JavaScript, CSS, imágenes, audio, video, fonts) al documento activo (HTML, PHP, CSS, fonts). Permite copiar varios archivos de una sola vez a qualquier directorio del proyecto o descárgalos de CDN y los tags serán insertados automáticamente.

fr.description: Reliez facilement vos fichiers (PHP, JavaScript, CSS, images, audio, vidéo, fonts) au document actif (HTML, PHP, CSS). Vous pouvez copier plusieurs fichiers à la fois sur n'importe quel répertoire de projet ou les télécharger à partir de CDN et les tags seront insérés automatiquement.

de.description: Verlinke schnell und einfach deine Dateien (PHP, JavaScript, CSS, Grafiken, Audio, Video, Fonts) in dem fokussierten Dokument (HTML, PHP, CSS). metadata.name: brackets-php-beautify
metadata.title: Brackets PHP-Beautify
metadata.description: Simple install-and-use code formatter (beautifier) PHP in Brackets. No extra configuration need, no PHP required

scripts.zip: ./node_modules/.bin/bestzip brackets-php-beautify.zip lib/* thirdparty/* main.js requirejs-config.json package.json
scripts.build: npm run-script lint && npm run-script transpile

metadata.name: encode-decode-for-brackets
metadata.title: Encode - Decode for Brackets
metadata.description: Encode or Decode text selections to and from various formats in Brackets. Supports Base64, Bin, HTML Entities, URI, nl2br

scripts.zip: npm run-script build && ./node_modules/.bin/bestzip encode-decode.zip lib/* convertors/* main.js requirejs-config.json package.json
scripts.build: npm run-script lint && npm run-script transpile

metadata.name: brackets-jasmine-reporter
metadata.title: Brackets Jasmine Reporter
metadata.description: Get inline Jasmine Unit test feedback within Brackets IDE

scripts.test: npm run-script test-lint && npm run-script test-jasmine
scripts.zip: npm run-script build && npm run-script compress
scripts.compress: ./node_modules/.bin/bestzip brackets-jasmine.zip support/*.js node/*.js node/*.json main.js requirejs-config.json package.json
